t: Watch The Lord of the Rings: The Rings of Power - Season 1 | Prime Video
s: Set thousands of years before the events of J.R.R. Tolkien’s The Lord of the Rings, this epic drama follows an ensemble cast of characters, both familiar and new, as they confront the long-feared re-emergence of evil to Middle-earth.

t: Watch The Lord of the Rings: The Rings of Power - Season 2 | Prime Video

t: Watch The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring | Prime Video
s: In the first part, The Lord of the Rings, a shy young hobbit named Frodo Baggins inherits a simple gold ring that holds the secret to the survival-or enslavement-of the entire world.

t: The Lord of the Rings: The Rings of Power | The One Wiki to Rule Them All | Fandom
s: March 10, 2025 - New Zealand, United Kingdom, Spain The Lord of the Rings: The Rings of Power[1] (formerly nicknamed LOTRonPrime)[2] is a series produced by Amazon MGM Studios (formerly Amazon Studios), alongside New Line Cinema. It is a spin-off of J.R.R. Tolkien's lore of Middle-earth.
